description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，第十三届全国人民代表大会江苏省代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a deputy from Jiangsu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关，任期为2018年至2023年。
description.en: The 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, serving from 2018 to 2023.

en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的组成人员，是中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的成员。
description.en: A member of the National People's Congress, the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个主要民族，是中华人民共和国的主体民族。
description.en: A major ethnic group in East Asia, and the majority ethnic group in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 陈杰是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Chen Jie is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，陈杰被选为江苏省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Chen Jie was elected as a deputy from Jiangsu Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.en: Chen Jie is a Deputy to the National People's Congress.
Chen Jie is of Han Chinese ethnicity.
Chen Jie is from Huai'an, Jiangsu.
